name: A Farmers Tale
description:
My  submission for Brackeys Game Jam 2021.1.

Live the memories of an old farmer turned soldier and leader.

Listen to his tale and  act out the memories of his greatest battles.

Command troops to beat the enemy,  soldiers will loose heart  when their friends fall and flee. Reach them with your troops and they will once again join your ranks and make you stronger.

-

Select squads with left click.

Order squads with right click. (click and drag is possible)

WASD to move the camera.

QE to rotate the camera.
